actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A concurrent resolution memorializing the President and the Secretary of Agriculture to declare a moratorium on farm loan repayments in order to protect the economy and the food supply of the Nation.

summary.text: Calls upon the President and the Secretary of Agriculture to use their existing authorities to provide for moratoriums on loan repayments and foreclosures for farmers suffering economic hardship.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution memorializing the President and the Secretary of Agriculture to declare a moratorium on farm loan repayments in order to protect the economy and the food supply of the Nation.
